descriptionHtml:
REDOWNLOAD IF YOU DOWNLOADED BEFORE SEEING THIS MESSAGE
I made a light mistake when packing the bsa which resulted in every file being blank. So please redownload.


I was disappointed after playing years of Oblivion, to find the Mysterium Xarxes in such horrid conditions in Skyrim. 

This is a modders resource containing the basic minimum files. The esp included contains a copy of it compiled so it can be viewed in game.

To test it in game, load the esp and go in to the console using the tilde key (~). You can then add the item using the following command.
player.additem xx000d63 1
**NOTE: Replace the xx with the load number for the mod, if you do not know it, you can use the command: help \"mysterium\" and use the you should find it.

You are free to use this as you please, just please send me an email with a link
vladashramATyahooDOTcom

also remember to please give me credit.

If anybody has any skills with texture editing and wish to make some higher resolution versions, PLEASE reupload them. I am not the best at using GIMP.
author: vladashram
